title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.3 - Prospective employer to submit application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.3 - Prospective employer to submit application

State Regulations
A license to act as a pier superintendent or hiring agent
will be issued only upon a verified application submitted by the prospective
employer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
